locations.clue_value: The past is a shadow that never fades.
locations.name: Old Town Square
locations.npc_dialogue: They say the clock knows more than it tells. Time is a fickle friend, isn't it?

locations.clue_value: The stones remember what the water forgets.
locations.name: Charles Bridge
locations.npc_dialogue: Crossing this bridge is like crossing into another world. Beware the echoes of the past.

locations.clue_value: All that glitters is not gold.
locations.name: Prague Castle
locations.npc_dialogue: The crown jewels are not the only treasures hidden here. Look beyond the glimmer.

locations.clue_value: The view is clearer when you look through the right lens.
locations.name: Fisherman's Bastion
locations.npc_dialogue: From here, you can see the whole city, but can you see the truth?

locations.clue_value: The past is a tapestry woven with lies.
locations.name: Buda Castle
locations.npc_dialogue: Legends are often rooted in reality, but reality can be a slippery slope.

locations.clue_value: Time flows like the Danube, but not all currents are visible.
locations.name: Chain Bridge
locations.npc_dialogue: This bridge connects more than just two banks; it connects stories untold.

locations.clue_value: The higher you climb, the deeper the shadows.
locations.name: St. Stephen's Cathedral
locations.npc_dialogue: The spire reaches for the heavens, but the truth lies beneath the surface.

locations.clue_value: A rose by any other name still has thorns.
locations.name: Belvedere Palace
locations.npc_dialogue: Beauty can be deceiving; the gardens hide secrets of their own.

locations.name: Vienna State Opera
locations.npc_dialogue: The music may be sweet, but the silence speaks volumes.

description: In the heart of Prague, a series of cryptic messages have surfaced, hinting at a clandestine operation that intertwines the past with the present. As you delve deeper, the lines between ally and adversary blur, revealing a web of deceit that challenges your perception of truth. Can you decipher the whispers before they consume you?

Connected Marek's background as a journalist to the thematic elements of the mission.
